trans-unit.source: Specifies optional behavior when retrieving name/value pairs from a registry key.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o comportamento opcional ao recuperar pares nome/valor de uma chave do registro.

trans-unit.source: Use the DoNotExpandEnvironmentNames flag with the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload.
trans-unit.target: Use o sinalizador DoNotExpandEnvironmentNames com o <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName>sobrecarga de método.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetValue%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryValueOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind.ExpandString?displayProperty=fullName> is retrieved without expanding its embedded environment variables.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryValueKind.ExpandString?displayProperty=fullName> é recuperado sem expandir suas variáveis de ambiente incorporadas.
